data.title: Hue Imperial City Private Tour
meta_keywords: fun things to do in da nang
things to do in da nang
tours by duration in da nang
data.meta_description: You will visit Hue Imperial City – the ancient capital of Vietnam as well as the accommodation of 13 Kings of the Nguyen Dynasty - the last feudatory Empire of Vietnam.Taking the trip with Dacotours, you will see how enthusiastic and passionate our tour guides are as we always try our best not only to bring the happiness and to deliver great stories about culture to our customers but also to devote to sustainable tourism development.and give hand to reserve the world heritage.Visiting Thien Mu Pagoda will give you a clearer view of the spiritual culture of the Vietnamese people and sightseeing the majestic scenery of the Perfume river.It is also a special spotlight to admire the tombs of Khai Dinh King and experience the architectural & religious influence of France. Such a nice experience to know more about the old time of Southeast Asia culture.
data.text:
Thong was a great tour guide. We went on the Hue Imperial City Private City tour and he was very easy to talk to and flexible. There were some parts of the tour that we wanted to skip and he was able to work around that. He is also good at english and is very knowledgeable in Vietnamese history, ...

Thong was a great tour guide. We went on the Hue Imperial City Private City tour and he was very easy to talk to and flexible. There were some parts of the tour that we wanted to skip and he was able to work around that. He is also good at english and is very knowledgeable in Vietnamese history, my family and I learned a lot from him during the tour. If you are in the Da Nang area and want to go on tours book with Thong you will not regret it!

Trip to Hue Imperial City with Happy was amazing. He was a super devoted and friendly guide who made sure to answer all our questions and gave us many historical details. Relaxed pace when touring. Also, it was a super nice small group, which was nice to integrate with, especially during lunch. T...

Trip to Hue Imperial City with Happy was amazing. He was a super devoted and friendly guide who made sure to answer all our questions and gave us many historical details. Relaxed pace when touring. Also, it was a super nice small group, which was nice to integrate with, especially during lunch. The lunch food could have been a bit better but other than that, amazing and would definitely recommend.

Our group of 12 really enjoyed the trip with Phước. It was a super hot day but he did a good job of keeping us moving and not spending too much time in the sun. He also was very knowledgeable about the area and made the trip interesting for history fans. He even helped us make a quick stop to try...

Our group of 12 really enjoyed the trip with Phước. It was a super hot day but he did a good job of keeping us moving and not spending too much time in the sun. He also was very knowledgeable about the area and made the trip interesting for history fans. He even helped us make a quick stop to try some Hue salted coffee :)

Thinh gave us a great tour of hue. He also gave us a mini Vietnamese lesson on the way. He is very knowledgeable not just about hue, but the entire area. He included scenic stops on the way, and lots of stories about the Nguyen dynasty, and the reactions of regular people to them.

Thinh gave us a great tour of hue. He also gave us a mini Vietnamese lesson on the way. He is very knowledgeable not just about hue, but the entire area. He included scenic stops on the way, and lots of stories about the Nguyen dynasty, and the reactions of regular people to them.
